mapper.insert: insert into f_fund_info ( fund_code, sorting,fund_type_id,create_user_id,update_user_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{fundCode}, #{sorting},#{fundTypeId},#{createUserId},#{updateUserId}, now(),now());
mapper.select: select ffi.id, ffi.fund_name AS fundName, ffi.fund_code AS fundCode, ffi.max_net_worth_date AS maxNetWorthDate, ffi.max_net_worth AS maxNetWorth, ffi.fund_type_id AS fundTypeId, fft.fund_type_name AS fundTypeName, fft.fund_type_number AS fundTypeNumber, ffi.sorting, ffnwt.id AS fundNetWorthTempId, ffl.id AS fundLevelId, ffi.volatility_value AS volatilityValue from f_fund_info ffi left join f_fund_type fft on fft.id=ffi.fund_type_id left join f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnwt on ffi.fund_code=ffnwt.fund_info_code left join f_fund_level ffl on ffi.fund_code=ffl.fund_info_code where ffi.delete_status = 0 order by ffi.sorting, ffi.create_time limit #{page} , #{limit};
select count(*) from f_fund_info where delete_status = 0
